title: Cleaning
description: Professional cleaning services for homes and offices. Ensure your space is spotless with our expert team.

title: Painting
description: High-quality painting services for interior and exterior surfaces, including wall touch-ups and furniture painting.

title: Plumbing
description: Expert plumbing services including leak fixing, installations, and unclogging of drains for a well-maintained home.

title: Electrical
description: Comprehensive electrical services, from light installations to smart home setups and electric car charging station installation.

title: Beauty
description: In-home beauty services for all your styling needs, including hair, makeup, nail care, facials, and massage therapy.

title: Moving & Delivery
description: Professional moving and delivery services to assist with packing, transport, unloading, and furniture assembly.

title: Babysitting
description: Trusted babysitting services for all ages, including special needs care and travel nanny services.

title: Personal Teaching
description: Experienced tutors offering lessons in language, music, arts, fitness coaching, and school subjects for all ages.

description: Comprehensive event preparation services including planning, decoration, catering, and music setup.

title: Appliance Repair
description: Reliable repair services for home appliances, from refrigerators and washers to computers and printers.
